TrainSimulator

Class TrackStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • TrainSimulator.TrackStatus

  • public class TrackStatus
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will maintain the Track information for a Train on a given set of blocks, on a track.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      TrackStatus(TrackModel theLine, int blockStart, int blockEnd)
      This Constructor creates a TrackStatus Object
